res_adv: J U Ahmed and M A Ahmed
resNameAdd:
1) MAHIZUDDIN SK
    Advocate - J U Ahmed and M A Ahmed

business_details.Business: The prosecution is able to establish the charge against the accused Mahizuddin Sheikh under section 8 of POCSO Act and accordingly he is convicted under said section and sentenced him to go rigorous imprisonment for 3 years  and also pay fine of Rs.5000/- in default simple imprisonment for 2 months.Fine amount, if realized, shall be given to the victim as compensation.
